column3: Life Event
Born in Poughkeepsie, NY
Parents bought the house on Fulton Avenue in Poughkeepsie, NY in which most of the crimes take place
column4: Parents bought the house on Fulton Avenue in Poughkeepsie, NY in which most of the crimes take place

column3: Made fun of by other children because of his weight and large stature.  He does not talk much, and mostly keeps to himself.
column4: Made fun of by other children because of his weight and large stature.  He does not talk much, and mostly keeps to himself.

column3: Graduated from Arlington Middle School
Begins to play sports and feels like he fits in with the team.
column4: Begins to play sports and feels like he fits in with the team.

column3: Started on the varsity football and wrestling teams in his freshman year in high school
column4: Started on the varsity football and wrestling teams in his freshman year in high school

column3: Graduates from high school
Joins the Army.  Serves basic training at Fort Sill in Oklahoma and afterwards is sent to Honolulu, HI.
column4: Joins the Army.  Serves basic training at Fort Sill in Oklahoma and afterwards is sent to Honolulu, HI.

column3: Discharged from the Army and returns home to live with family.  Begins attending Duchess County Community College and works for the Arlington School District as a janitor at Arlington Middle School.
column4: Discharged from the Army and returns home to live with family.  Begins attending Duchess County Community College and works for the Arlington School District as a janitor at Arlington Middle School.

column3: Promoted to hall and detention monitor.
column4: Promoted to hall and detention monitor.

column3: Picks up 30 year old prostitute Wendy Meyers (1).  The two negotiate sex for money and have sex until Francois becomes angry, believing that Myers had ripped him off. He begins choking her until she dies when the hyoid bone in her neck cracks.  After the murder, he bathes her and stores the body in a black garbage bag in the attic.
column4: Picks up 30 year old prostitute Wendy Meyers (1).  The two negotiate sex for money and have sex until Francois becomes angry, believing that Myers had ripped him off. He begins choking her until she dies when the hyoid bone in her neck cracks.  After the murder, he bathes her and stores the body in a black garbage bag in the attic.

column3: The boyfriend of Wendy Myers reports her missing to the police.
column4: The boyfriend of Wendy Myers reports her missing to the police.

column3: Picks up 28 year old prostitute Gina Barone (2) and negotiates sex for money.  The two have sex in the garage of the Francois residence until Francois becomes angry, feeling that Barone had ripped him off.  He chokes her until her death and then moves the body to the attic of the house.
column4: Picks up 28 year old prostitute Gina Barone (2) and negotiates sex for money.  The two have sex in the garage of the Francois residence until Francois becomes angry, feeling that Barone had ripped him off.  He chokes her until her death and then moves the body to the attic of the house.

column3:
After dropping his mother off at work at the Hudson River Psychiatric Hospital, picks up prostitute Cathy Marsh (3).  He takes Marsh back home to his house after 
arranging sex for money.  After sex, he chokes and kills Marsh before washing her body in the bathroom.  He then takes Marsh’s body to the attic and places it with the other bodies.
column4:
After dropping his mother off at work at the Hudson River Psychiatric Hospital, picks up prostitute Cathy Marsh (3).  He takes Marsh back home to his house after 
arranging sex for money.  After sex, he chokes and kills Marsh before washing her body in the bathroom.  He then takes Marsh’s body to the attic and places it with the other bodies.

column3: Gina Barone is reported missing by her mother Patricia Barone.
column4: Gina Barone is reported missing by her mother Patricia Barone.

column3: Leaves job at Arlington Middle School.  Begins work at Anderson School, where he is fired after a short time.
column4: Leaves job at Arlington Middle School.  Begins work at Anderson School, where he is fired after a short time.

column3: Kathleen Hurly’s (4) family reports her missing.  Around this time, cops begin to suspect that the missing woman may have fallen prey to a serial killer.  A cop, named Siegrist, begins to look for a pattern.

Within one hour after the police meet with Francois, Mary Healey Graccone (5) is killed.  Francois picks her up and kills her the same way as the others, and places her dead body in the attic of the house.

Catherine Marsh is reported missing by her mother.  She had not talked to her mother since November 11, 1996.  Marsh was pregnant at the time of her death.  The police question some prostitutes who say that Francois liked to choke some of them.
Michelle Eason, an African-American prostitute disappears.
Michelle Eason is reported missing.  The police also receive a complaint of Francois’ illegally parked vehicle.
Francois’ vehicle is repeatedly ticketed for illegal parking.
Francois’ vehicle is impounded.
Francois picks up the car, abandons the car and license plates, and purchases a late-model Toyota Camry.
Mary Giaccone is reported missing.
The first story is reported on the number of missing women in the area in the Poughkeepsie Journal.

Police officer Siegrist follows Francois as he drives his mother to work.  After Francois drops his mother off, the officer stops him and asks him to come to the station for questioning.  Francois is questioned, but admits to nothing.  He also takes and passes a lie detector test.
Picks up and tries to kill prostitute Lora Gallagher, but she is able to free herself and convince Francois to drive her back to Main Street.
Lora Gallagher files assault charges.
Pleads guilty to assault charges and sentenced to 15 days in jail; only serves 7 days.
Picks up and kills prostitute Sandra Jean French (6).  Afterwards, he dumps the body in the attic of his house.
Moves French’s body to crawl space of house.
The police find French’s abandoned vehicle in Arlington.  At the same time, her mother reports her to be missing.
Picks up and kills prostitute Audrey Pugliese (7) and dumps her body in the crawl space of the house.
Picks up and kills prostitute Catina Newmaster (8) in car and leaves the body in the garage at his home.
Moves Newmaster’s body to crawl space of house.

Picks up prostitute Diane Franco and attempts to strangle her.  She convinces him to drive her back to Main Street, where she reports the incident to the gas station attendant.  Francois is brought in for questioning and confesses to murdering missing women.  He is charged with 2nd degree murder.
The bodies removed from the Francois residence.  For further investigation, the police keep the bodies of the victims for two weeks.
Indicted in Dutchess County Court for the murder of Catina Newmaster
Enters “not guilty” plea.
Formally charged with 8 counts of 1st degree murder, 8 counts of 2nd degree murder, and one count of attempted assault.
Enters “guilty” plea for 1st degree murder to avoid death penalty.
Appeal heard at New York State Court of Appeals.
New York State Court of Appeals rejects the appeal.
It is announced that Francois is HIV positive.
Francois confesses to all eight murders in a plea bargain that allows him to avoid the death penalty.  He is sentenced to life in prison without parole.
Becomes Prisoner #A4160 at Attica Prison in New York.
column4: Becomes Prisoner #A4160 at Attica Prison in New York.

column3: Earns $30 a week as a welder in prison
column4: Earns $30 a week as a welder in prison
